title: Lethal Weapon
description: In this Dateline classic, neurologist Dr. Autumn Klein is rushed back into its emergency room in critical condition just an hour after leaving work at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center. ER doctors desperately try to save one of their own. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 2, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
